short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide unwanted elements on web pages with right-click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Element Hider lets you customize any webpage by hiding unwanted elements with a simple right-click. Perfect for:
- Removing distracting elements while reading
- Cleaning up cluttered web pages
- Hiding unwanted ads or content sections
- Customizing your favorite websites

Features:
- Easy right-click to hide any element
- Visual highlighting of elements before hiding
- Restore hidden elements with one click
- Automatically remembers hidden elements per website
- Works on any website
